text: 15:45 Jenesis 2:7; Jon 6:33; 6:39-40; 6:54; 6:63; 2 Korin 3:4-6; 3:17; Filipai 3:21Godɨn Akɨnafarim ghaze, “Gumazir faragha otozim, Adam, God a gamizɨ an angamɨra iti.” Ezɨ Adamɨn bar gɨn izezim, a Duamɨn otogha, gumazamizibar amutɨ me angamɨra ikiam.15:45 Adamɨn bar gɨn otozir kam, a Kraisra. Nɨ 1 Korin 15:21-22 ko Rom 5:14-19ɨn ganigh.
